manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Starlight Sensor With the starlight sensor, images in low-light conditions will still appear crisp high resolution. Crystal Clear 2K HD The pristine 2K HD 4 MP video will capture every detail of what goes on outside even when zoomed in. Color Night Vision Featuring dual-integrated spotlights for colored night vision. IR night vision up to 98 ft. Next page 1 Starlight Sensor 2 Crystal Clear 2K HD 3 Color Night Vision

Custom Activity Zones, Person Detection, Instant Notifications Never miss any activity with instant motion and person detection notifications. Know every time something is going on outside your home. Create custom activity zones over vulnerable areas such as glass windows or doors to be alerted immediately and use the built-in siren to ward them off.

Previous page View Live Anywhere See what’s going on in your outside your home from anywhere, anytime, via the LaView app. Crisp 2-Way Audio Experience crisp 2-way talk without muffled voices or poor audio. Push-to-talk anytime on app. Support Multi-device Live stream access through web browser for your camera (9 live feeds maximum simultaneously). Next page 1 View Live Anywhere 2 Crisp 2-Way Audio 3 Support Multi-device

Weather-Resistant And Ready For Outdoor Deployment Deploy your outdoor security camera with peace of mind with a true to its name weatherproof IP65, this Wi-Fi camera is ready for harsh particles and rain. Easily place on your front door, back porch, or facing vulnerable spots without worrying about precipitation impacting your home security.

Secure Local or Cloud Storage With LaView Care Save the footage continuously on up to a 128 GB microSD card (card not included) or subscribe to LaView Care which saves 30-day video history and provides additional benefits such as manual clip recording, video sharing, and automatic clip saving triggered whenever motion is detected. Simple and Hassle Free Setup Setup in minutes with a simple 3-step process. *B5 is not wire-free, there is a 10ft. long USB cable inside the box for connecting to the power supply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing to dislike about how these cameras function. They installed seamlessly into my system of LaView cameras of all types. A simple camera scan of the UPC symbol that presents itself on my phone and it's done, set up...finished and functioning. The only limiting factor is my internet service not being what it should be...and the only affect that has is a slight delay in live view streaming that would not exist at all if I had better ISP service.I can access my live view with sound and two way communication from anywhere at any time. I can replay locally recorded content from the cameras SD card which records 24/7, non-stop. I can keep several days at a time and the system simply records over the oldest day first once the card becomes full. Additionally, the cloud service holds event recordings for 2 weeks (on the subscription I use, 30 days on the other plan). So if someone should destroy the camera and SD card, I still have the evidence needed to know what's happening. The event recording and the push notification of movement detected takes place so quickly, that 99.9% of the time the object moving thru the frame that is the trigger is captured in the notification. This is a major problem with most other systems at this price level and many that are more expensive.The night vision is beyond fantastic. These have a spotlight feature that illuminates the area upon motion detection and can also use AI Human Body detection to be more discerning about what takes up recording storage space saving memory.I strongly recommend the Laiew system to anyone wanting survailance security, whether it's one PTZ camera with motion tracking, or multiple stationary 2k cameras like these...or any combination thereof. Do not hesitate to install this very user friendly, quality system. The cameras available will fit any circumstance imaginable and ALL have 2 way communication. This is the best affordable system available on the market today that are way more capable than any others I've researched at the same price point. Simply put.... simply AWESOME !!!!As you can see in my uploads, the picture is crystal clear and when the infrared night vision is activated, the picture is still just as clear albeit black and white, of course.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievable quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Crystal clear 2-megapixel image quality, automatic day/night mode, motion detection, human detection, floodlights and mini sirens built into the cameras, and it's all configurable if you know what you're doing. Most people will be fine with how it comes right out of the box.Setup was super simple once I sorted out my own hiccups like bluetooth discovery and enabling the 2.4G side of my wifi system. Adding and naming devices is basically instant, and I had a 4-camera system fully installed between 8am and 2:30pm. 5th camera going in once the rain stops.Both motion and "human detection" functions do produce some false positives here and there, but for a $100 camera system I have nothing to really complain about - you get what you pay for, and the good far outweighs the bad.Their cloud storage plans are very affordable. I'm using microSD cards plus cloud. (if they go offline they still record to the internal card).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Security Solution: LaView Camera Delivers Top-Notch Performance
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of purchasing and installing the LaView Camera system for my home, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance. From its impressive features to its exceptional image quality, this security solution has exceeded all my expectations.First and foremost, the video quality provided by the LaView Camera is outstanding. The high-resolution images captured are incredibly clear and detailed, ensuring that every moment is captured with utmost precision. Whether it's during the day or at night, the camera's advanced night vision capabilities guarantee that my property is always under reliable surveillance.Setting up the LaView Camera was a breeze. The installation process was straightforward, thanks to the user-friendly interface and comprehensive instructions provided. Within no time, I had the cameras up and running, and I was able to effortlessly connect them to my smartphone for remote access. The mobile app offers a seamless experience, allowing me to monitor my premises from anywhere in the world with just a few taps on my phone.One aspect that truly sets the LaView Camera apart is its extensive range of features. The system incorporates motion detection technology, which sends timely alerts directly to my phone whenever any movement is detected. This proactive approach to security gives me peace of mind, knowing that I will be immediately notified of any potential threats. Additionally, the camera's two-way audio functionality allows me to communicate with visitors or potential intruders, further enhancing the security aspect.The durability and weather resistance of the LaView Camera are commendable. Built to withstand various environmental conditions, including rain and extreme temperatures, these cameras are designed to provide reliable performance even in the harshest of conditions. This robustness ensures that my investment will continue to protect my property for years to come.Lastly, I must mention the exceptional customer support provided by LaView. Their team was prompt, professional, and extremely helpful in addressing any inquiries or concerns I had during the installation process. It's reassuring to know that I have access to reliable support should I ever need assistance in the future.Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend the LaView Camera system to anyone in search of a top-notch security solution. Its outstanding image quality, user-friendly interface, advanced features, and exceptional customer support make it an absolute standout in the market. With LaView, you can rest assured that your property will be well-protected, giving you the peace of mind you deserve.
